radiographic_examinations.findings: The uterus measures 8.9 x 4.6 x 6.1 cm with a calcified fibroid measuring 2.2 x 2.4 x 1.9 cm on the right. The endometrium is homogeneous and measures 3 mm. A right paraovarian simple cyst measures 0.8 x 0.5 x 0.6 cm. The left ovary contains an echogenic focus measuring 0.4 cm, unchanged from prior study and consistent with a dermoid. There is no free fluid in the pelvis. A blind-ending structure with gut signature was identified in the right lower quadrant, measuring 7 mm proximally and up to 9 mm distally, noncompressible, accompanied by increased echogenicity of the surrounding peritoneal fat, representing acute appendicitis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The left ovary's echogenic focus is unchanged from prior study.
